info.description: Farmers Module Service with Workflow-Based Architecture for Farm Management
info.title: Farmers Module API

get.description: Retrieve the audit trail for system activities

post.description: Check if a user has permission to perform a specific action

get.description: Check the health status of the service and its dependencies

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of components to check
parameters.name: components

post.description: Initialize the system with default roles and permissions
Aggregates farms, cycles, and activities data for a farmer with proper scope validation

get.description: Exports farmer portfolio data for a specific farmer ID from URL path

post.description: Provides org-level KPIs including counts and areas by season/status with proper scope validation

get.description: Gets organization dashboard counters for a specific org ID from URL path
get.summary: Get organization dashboard counters by ID

post.description: Cancel an in-progress bulk operation
Add multiple farmers to an FPO in a single operation

get.description: Download a file containing the results of a bulk operation

parameters.description: Include all records or just failures
parameters.name: include_all

post.description: Retry processing of failed records from a bulk operation

get.description: Get the current status and progress of a bulk operation
Download a template file for bulk farmer upload

post.description: Validate farmer data without actually processing it

get.description: List crops with optional filtering by category, season, etc.

parameters.description: Search in name or scientific name
parameters.name: search

post.description: Create a new crop with master data

get.description: Get a paginated list of farm activities with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new farm activity within a crop cycle

get.description: Retrieve a specific farm activity by its ID
get.summary: Get a farm activity by ID

put.description: Update farm activity details (only for non-completed activities)
Mark a farm activity as completed with output data

get.description: Get a paginated list of crop cycles with optional filtering

post.description: Start a new crop cycle with farm and crop details

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific crop cycle

put.description: Update details of an existing crop cycle
End a crop cycle and mark it as completed

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific crop

delete.description: Soft delete a crop (marks as inactive)

post.description: Detects spatial intersections between farm boundaries within an organization
Rebuilds GIST indexes for spatial tables for database maintenance
Heals broken AAA references in farmer_links by checking against AAA service
Validates WKT geometry using PostGIS with SRID enforcement and integrity checks

get.description: Retrieve a list of all farms with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new farm with geographic boundaries and metadata

get.description: Retrieve a specific farm by its ID

put.description: Update farm details including name, geometry, and location

post.description: Link a farmer to a Farmer Producer Organization with AAA validation

get.description: Retrieve the linkage status between a farmer and FPO

delete.description: Unlink a farmer from a Farmer Producer Organization with soft delete

get.description: List farmers with filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new farmer profile

get.description: Retrieve a farmer profile by farmer ID (primary key)

put.description: Update an existing farmer profile by farmer ID (primary key)

delete.description: Delete a farmer profile by farmer ID (primary key)

get.description: Retrieve a farmer profile by AAA user ID (no org required)
get.summary: Get farmer by user ID only

put.description: Update an existing farmer profile by user ID (no org required)
put.summary: Update farmer by user ID only

delete.description: Delete a farmer profile by user ID (no org required)
delete.summary: Delete farmer by user ID only

get.description: Retrieve a farmer profile by AAA user ID and org ID
get.summary: Get farmer by user ID and org ID

put.description: Update an existing farmer profile by user ID and org ID
put.summary: Update farmer by user ID and org ID

delete.description: Delete a farmer profile by user ID and org ID
delete.summary: Delete farmer by user ID and org ID

post.description: Creates a new FPO organization with CEO user setup and user groups

get.description: Retrieves FPO reference information by AAA organization ID

post.description: Registers an existing FPO organization for local reference management
Assign a KisanSathi user to a specific farmer

get.description: Retrieve the KisanSathi assignment for a specific farmer

post.description: Create a new KisanSathi user with role assignment

put.description: Reassign a KisanSathi to a different farmer or remove the assignment

get.description: Get list of available crop categories
Get list of available crop seasons
Get simplified crop data for dropdown/lookup purposes
Retrieve a list of all available irrigation sources for farm management
Retrieve a list of all available soil types for farm management
Get simplified variety data for dropdown/lookup purposes
List crop varieties with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new variety for a specific crop

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific crop variety

delete.description: Soft delete a crop variety (marks as inactive)

deduplication_mode.description: How to handle duplicates: skip, update, error

description.example: High yielding wheat variety suitable for irrigated conditions
A farmer producer organization serving 500+ farmers in Rampur region

limit.description: Maximum number of overlaps to return

min_overlap_area_ha.description: Minimum overlap area in hectares to report

password.description: Optional password, will be generated if not provided

dry_run.description: If true, only report what would be fixed without making changes
DryRun indicates whether to perform a dry run without making changes

force.description: Force indicates whether to force re-seeding even if already seeded

description.example: Updated description with latest cultivation practices

check_bounds.description: Whether to check if geometry is within India bounds (~50 ha)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
